ai-ne22:1.1_0: Herein, what is the plane of taking up practices?
ai-ne22:2.3_0: and right view at the fore.
ai-ne22:2.6_0: they’ve given up all bad rebirths.”
ai-ne22:3.1_0: “One whose mind is rightly concentrated, who has right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion. If he avoids right view, hence he makes it happy and pleased, thinking ‘I’ll be able to get well.’ He sees all right view, he abandons all right view, he in all right view.
ai-ne22:3.2_0: All is incapable of being given up, surmounted, and overcoming all the hards, they will lose.
